casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brittany Sue Opal BRYANT 117P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2019 Anton M. Lebedev, Attorney at Law, for Bryant, Brittany Sue Opal. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Adam Everett, Assistant District Attorney, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Davis Cooper.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of April 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of April 2019."
